text: A breakfast sandwich is any sandwich filled with foods that are considered breakfast foods. Breakfast sandwiches are usually sold at fast food restaurants and delis. But they could also be made at home. The most popular breakfast sandwiches are the bacon, egg and cheese sandwich, and sausage, egg, and cheese. Many types of bread can be used to make breakfast sandwiches, like biscuits, english muffins, and bagels. Category:Breakfast foods Category:Sandwiches
title: Breakfast sandwich
